Translations.Text: Ili konsult vi pri spoils milit. Dir Des! spoils de milit aparten al DI messenger. Vi observ DI exhort unu another est righteous obe DI His messenger vi est believers
Prav believers est those kor trem when DI menci when His revelations recited them their faith strengthened ili fid their Lord
Ili observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) el our provisions al them ili don charity
Such est ver believers. Ili ating alt rang their Lord tro forgiveness generous provision
Tiam your Lord willed ke vi las your hejm fulfill specif plan kelk believers igx exposed as reluctant believers
Ili argued vi truth eben post cxio eksplik them. Ili akt as ili driv nepr death
Recall ti DI promes vi victory nepr grup vi ankoraux wanted vizagx weaker grup! est di plan establ truth His vort defeat disbelievers
Li dekret ke truth prevail falsehood vanish evildoers
Do when vi implored your Lord ven rescue Li respond vi mi supporting vi 1000 angxel en succession
DI DON VI this BON news strengthen your KOR. Victory ven nur el DI. DI est Almighty SAGX
Li kauxz peaceful dorm overtake vi pacify vi Li send akv cxiel clean vi therewith. Li protekt vi diabl curse reassured your kor strengthened your foothold
Recall ke your Lord inspir angxel mi est vi support those kred Mi jxet terror kor de those disbelieved Vi strik them kol vi strik ecx cxiu fingr
This est ki ili justly incurred batal DI His messenger! Por those batal DI His messenger di retribution est severe
This est pun disbelievers; ili incurred retribution Infer
O vi kred vi renkont disbelievers mobilized vi ne turn flee
Anyone turn ti tag port battle plan join his grup incurred wrath DI his abode est Infer; ki miserable destiny
Ne est vi killed them; DI est Unu killed them. Ne est vi jxet when vi jxet; DI est Unu jxet. Li tiel don believers sxanc earn a lot de kredit! DI est Hearer Omniscient
Additionally DI tiel nullifies schemes disbelievers

(Vi streb victory O disbelievers) victory did ven; gxi aparten al believers! Vi refrain aggression) est put vi vi return tial vol ni. Your arme neniam help vi ne materi kiel great Por DI est believers
O vi kred obe DI His messenger ne disregard him while vi auxd
Ne est those dir Ni auxd when ili ne auxd
Mav creatures sight DI est surd dumb who ne kompren
Hav DI kon de any bon en them Li far them hearers! Eben se Li far them hearers ili ankoraux turn aversion
O vi kred vi respond DI messenger when li invit vi ki don vi life! Vi kon ti DI est closer al vi than your kor kaj ke antaux Him vi summoned
Beware da retribution ne lim evildoers vi! Vi kon ti di retribution est severe
Memor vi uz est few oppressed tim ke popol snatch vi Li granted vi secure sanctuary supported vi His victory proviz vi bon provisions vi est appreciative
O vi kred ne perfid DI messenger ne perfid those fid vi tuj ke vi kon
Vi kon ke your mon your infan est test DI posed great recompense
O vi kred vi reverence DI Li enlighten vi remit your pek forgive vi! DI POSED infinite grace
disbelievers plot scheme neutralize vi kill vi banish vi! Tamen ili plot scheme tial does DI! DI EST PUT schemer
When our revelations recited them ili dir Ni auxd. Se ni wanted ni dir sam ajx! These est ne plur than tales el preter
Ili ankaux dir Our di this est really truth Vi tiam dusx us rok cxiel versx us painful punishment
Di ne est pun them while vi est their midst; DI ne est pun them while ili streb forgiveness
Hav ili ne ind di retribution per repelling others Sankt Masjid eben kvankam ili ne est custodians thereof? Prav custodians thereof est righteous plej de them ne kon
Their Kontakt Prayers (Salat) shrine (Ka bah) est ne plur than mockery means repelling popol crowding them out)! Do sufer retribution your disbelief
Those disbelieve spend their mon repel others voj DI. Ili spend gxi tiam gxi turn into sorrow remorse them. Ultimately ili defeated all disbelievers summoned al Infer
DI testament KRIBR FOR MAV EL BON TIAM pile MAV sur top da each ali all EN 1 pile TIAM JXET GXI INFER! Such est losers
Tell those disbelieved ili stop all their preter forgiven! Sed se ili return ili incur sam sort their previous counterparts
Vi batal them ward oppression practice your religi devoted al DI sol! Ili refrain aggression tiam DI est fully Seer de cxio ili do
Ili turn tiam vi kon ti DI est your Lord Mastr; bon Lord Mastr put supporter
Vi kon ti vi gajn any spoils milit one-fifth ir DI messenger don relativ orf poor vojagx alien Vi do this vi kred en DI en ki ni revealed our servant tag decision tag 2 arme clashed DI est Omnipotent

Recall ti vi est val while ili est ali flank! Tiam their karavan mov lower muel Hav vi plan gxi this voj vi ne done gxi! Di est port predetermined materi whereby those destin annihilated annihilated obvious raci those destin sav sav obvious raci! DI est Hearer Omniscient
(DI far them APER your SONGX O Muhammad) fewer EN numer Hav Li far them aper numerous vi failed vi disput yourselves! Di sav situaci. Li est Knower innermost thoughts
Kaj when temp ven vi vizagx them Li far them aper fewer your okul far vi aper fewer their okul ankaux! Por DI willed port nepr plan! All decisions far DI
O vi kred when vi renkont arme vi ten fast commemorate DI frequently ke vi sukces
Vi obe DI His messenger kaj ne disput yourselves lest vi fail scatter your strength! Vi steadfastly persevere DI est those steadfastly persevere
Ne est those las their hejm grudgingly nur montr en fakt discouraged others sekv path DI! DI EST fully aware da CXIO ILI do

Diabl ornam their works their okul dir Vi ne defeated any popol hodiaux mi batal vi. as baldaux as 2 arme vizagx each ali li torn his kalkan fled dir mi disown vi! Mi seg ki vi ne seg. Mi est afraid de DI. Di retribution est awesome
hypocrites those harbored dub their kor dir These popol tromp their religi. se unu puts his fid DI tiam DI est Almighty Sagx
Vi nur seg those disbelieved when angxel put them death! Ili bat them their vizagx their rear ends Gust retribution Infer
This est consequence ki your man send for! DI est NENIAM unjust towards creatures
This est sam sort ke de Pharaoh's popol those disbelieved them! Ili rejected di revelations DI pun them por their pek. DI est powerful His retribution est severe
DI NE SXANGX BEN LI bestowed any POPOL ILI DECID SXANGX! DI est Hearer Omniscient
Such est kaz popol de Pharaoh others them. Ili 1 rejected sign their Lord Consequently ni annihilated them their pek. Ni dron Pharaoh's popol; wicked consistently pun
Mav creatures sight DI est those disbelieved ili ne kred
Vi reach agreements them ili violate their agreements cxiu temp; ili ne est righteous
Do se vi renkont them en milit vi set them as deterrent ekzempl those ven them ke ili pren heed
When vi perfid grup de popol vi mobilize them sam manier! DI NE AM betrayers
Let ne those disbelieve opini ili get gxi ili neniam escape

Vi prepar them all potenc vi muster all equipment vi mobilize ti vi frighten enemies DI your enemies tro others ne kon vi; DI kon them. Whatever vi spend ig de DI testament repaid vi generously malplej injustice
Ili resort pac shall vi put your fid DI! Li est Hearer Omniscient
Ili want tromp vi tiam DI testament suffice vi! Li help vi kun His support kaj kun believers
(Li reconciled kor believers). Hav vi spent all mon ter vi ne reconcile their kor! Di did reconcile them! Li est Almighty Sagx
O vi prophet sufficient vi est DI believers sekv vi
O vi prophet vi exhort believers batal. tie est 20 de vi est steadfast ili defeat 200 cent de vi defeat 1000 de those disbelieved Ke est ili est popol who ne kompren

Tuj (ke many neo popol joined vi) DI far gxi facil vi Li kon vi est as fort as vi uz est Henceforth cent steadfast believers defeat 200 1000 de vi defeat 2000 di las. DI est those steadfastly persevere
Ne prophet akir captives li participates en des batal Vi popol streb sxtof this mond while DI advokat Hereafter DI est Almighty SAGX
Est por predetermined dekret el DI vi sufer sur kont da ki vi pren terrible retribution
Do mangx spoils vi earned ti which est lawful bon observ DI! DI est Forgiver Merciful
O vi prophet tell prisoners milit your man DI kon de anything bon en your kor Li don vi put than anything vi perd forgiven vi. DI est Forgiver Merciful
Kaj se ili want perfid vi ili jam perfid DI. This why Li far them losers. DI est Omniscient SAGX

Surely those kred emigrated strove their mon their viv en ig DI tro as those who hosted them don them rifugx supported them ili est allies de 1 another As por those kred do ne emigrate vi vi ne sxuld them any support gxis ili emigrate! Tamen se ili bezon your help brethren faith vi help them popol whom vi sign pac treaty. DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do
Those disbelieved est allies de 1 another Vi keep these commandments tie est chaos ter terrible corruption
Those kred emigrated strove ig DI tro as those hosted them don them rifugx supported them these est ver believers! Ili ind forgiveness generous recompense
Those kred afterwards emigrated strove vi ili aparten vi! Those est rilat al each ali
